newsitem.title: UK: MSAS Cassin opens Belfast office.
newsitem.headline: MSAS Cassin opens Belfast office.

text.p: MSAS Cassin, part of international freight forwarders MSAS Cargo International, said it has opened a new office at Belfast International airport in Northern Ireland.
In the past year, the company has seen a number of major developments in Ireland, including the opening of a 44,000sq ft logistics centres in Dublin, MSAS said in a statement.
The new site brings the number of offices in Ireland to five -- Dublin, Cork, Shannon, Waterford and now Belfast.
-- Reuters Air Cargo Newsroom Tel+44 171 542 7706 Fax:5017
